entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: NNE 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
